ovdesc.p: This ‘L’ type application records the main elements from a single SEPA received file.
If the file contains more than one message, so does the application record in a multi-value set.

Each multi-value contains the operation code as well as the first and last sequential number attributed to the keys of the SEPA.INWARD records generated for each Transaction Information in the XML message.

It also records the Group Header, as well as the Original Group information if any, in a suitable format allowing a drill down on the original XML sequence or to rebuild an already processed file by adding the Transaction Information retrieved from each SEPA.INWARD record.

It is used by the enquiry SEPA.INWARD.FILES with the nofile program SEPA.VIEW.INWARD.FILES to access sequentially the inward archives selected by a range of processing dates or a search operand on a file name or identification key.
It also records the global payment entry done on the SEPA nostro account for each received message unless this entry is forced at the SEPA.INWARD level for each transaction.

If the inward message is a Customer to Bank, a single entry will be done for the XML message on his account of the customer. If a transaction from the message is later cancelled, an entry with the opposite sign will be posted for its own amount alone for a suitable value date.

The key to that file is built of selected elements taken from each Group Header sequence and separated by a dot ‘.’. These elements are defined by filling in their FIELD.EXTRACT with a FILEn value in the SEPA.LAYOUT record. This may enforce the recording of messages from the same file in more then one SEPA.INWARD.FILE record whenever their concatenated keys are different.
If no concatenation element has been defined, the inward file name will be taken instead.

If this calculate key has already been attributed to other files, and if the Group Header of the new message is different from any known one, the system will add an additional sequence number s with a dash ‘-‘ as separator to the key to ensure its unicity.

desc.p: This fields holds the Key to the FT generated for payment of the remitting CB customer if overrided.
Associated Multi Value Set of field MESSAGE.ID
This fields contains the Message Id generated by concatenation of SEPA.HEADER and SEPA.LAYOUT Tags with FIELD.EXTRCT prefixed by “MNEW”.
This field contains the UNIFI.XML.MSG.ID from SEPA.LAYOUT.
Associated Multi Value Set of field MESSAGE.ID
Value should exist in UNIFI.XML.MESSAGE Application
This field specifies the Original Group Information sequence, stored as it can be shown easily as it was in its original XML presentation by a delivered T24 drill down enquiry.
Associated Multi Value Set of field MESSAGE.ID
This field denotes the Issuing PE-ACH platform center
Value should exist in SEPA.PEACH Application
This field specifies the Added preheader (FM converted to VM).
This field specifies the Treatment date of the inward file.
This field specifies the Treatment time of the inward file.
Value upto 5 type TIME( Time Format)
This field holds the Prefix key of SEPA.INWARD.DETAIL (CB)
Associated Multi Value Set of field MESSAGE.ID
This field holds the Status of the transaction posted.
This field contains the Comments posted on the XML message.
Associated Multi Value Set of field MESSAGE.ID and Multi Value Field
This field contains a Reference of the global accounting entry.
A context enquiry allows a drill down.
Associated Multi Value Set of field MESSAGE.ID and Multi Value field
This field contains a Global amount of transactions found in the XML message in clearing currency.
A second sub-value is given if the local currency is not the clearing currency.
Associated Multi Value Set of field MESSAGE.ID and Multi Value field
Associated Multi Value Set of field MESSAGE.ID
This field contains a Sequential suffix number attributed to the first Transaction Information of the XML message in the SEPA.INWARD file.
Associated Multi Value SubSet of field MESSAGE.ID
This field contains a Sequential suffix number attributed to the last Transaction Information of the XML message in the SEPA.INWARD file.
Associated Multi Value Set of field TRANS.FIRST
This field denotes the Number of transactions found in message.
Associated Multi Value Set of field MESSAGE.ID
This field specifies the Creation date of the inward file.
This field specifies the Creation time of the inward file.
Value upto 5 type TIME( Time Format)
This field contains the ID of the Handing over customer
Value should exist in CUSTOMER Application
This field contains the File header sequence stored in such a way that it can be shown easily as it was in its original XML presentation by a delivered T24 drill down enquiry.
This Field contains the Name of the file received in library.
This Field holds the Last Tag of the file “</SEPA.HEADER.ID>”
This field specifies the Group header sequence stored in such a way that it can be shown easily as it was in its original XML presentation by a delivered T24 drill down enquiry.
Associated Multi Value Set of field MESSAGE.ID
This field holds the Identification key made unique if needed.
This field holds total charge amount to be deducted for bulk level posting.
Total amount of transaction. This field is not used currently
Associated Multi Value Set of field MESSAGE.ID
Total Number of Transactions in a file. Taken from the value in NbOfTxs tag in the XML file from Header part
Total Transaction Amount in a file. Taken from the value in CtrlSum tag in the XML file from Header part
